body_html: @jhseu Yes, I'm following the HDFS support, in that I provide options for both interactive selection and the env var. Furthermore, invalid selections, such as choosing libjpeg-turbo when the build support for assembly is not available, causes a configure failure and a recommendation to install the appropriate tools, or select N during the libjpeg-turbo prompt (or selecting 0 using the env var) to fall back to libjpeg. This should make libjpeg-turbo completely optional, and improve performance for users who have the appropriate tooling on their OS or Docker container.
